message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $175. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $175 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. This is my best offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $175 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $155. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I'm confident you'll find it worth it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $155 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $120.  This is a fair price considering my limit and the value you've placed on the product.

I understand that $155 is still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $140. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I'm confident you'll find it worth it. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $140 is still a little too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $130. This is my final offer, and I hope we can reach an agreement.

I understand that $140 was still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $135. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that the product's value is worth it. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, and I hope you'll consider it.
